metadata.name: WHITE, Gangwon-do, Korea, 2012, Kim Joowon
metadata.description:
This work is my favorite piece in the  WHITE series. I met this little pine tree in the mountains of Gangwon-do,  where it snowed.

A moment of stillness and silence where all the surrounding sounds and scenery disappeared.

The feeling of awe when confronted with a single being is indescribable.
